ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: About the cloaks...what kind of skin/pelt do you need to turn in and what kind or critter drops them most often?  I m guessing Polar Bears do but we all know
ygData.messageBody:
About the cloaks...what kind of skin/pelt do you need to turn in and what
kind or critter drops them most often? I'm guessing Polar Bears do but we
all know that EQ doesn't need to make sense all the time :).

and...does anyone know how much these skins/pelts go for if I were to go
there and auction to buy them (save on hunting time).

Thanks,
Omeg


>A somewhat tedious but still lucrative method involves Polar Bear Cloaks.
>You can make these for 5 plat each in Everfrost, and they will sell for
>10-15 on Faydwer... possibly more these days.
